Reviews.Title: Total pile of crap
Reviews.Author: J2S Tactical "j2stactical dot com"
Reviews.Content: This alarm system is a burglars best friend. It refuses to work, even after a few calls to tech support and even after Amazon sent out a second alarm system (this is the review of the replacement unit I was sent, see my other review for the initial unit)The replacement unit came with the same problem that the initial unit had, it is basically a design flaw that no matter how many you are sent the problem won't go away. The "keypad" is a piece of hard plastic and you have to press into it to register a key press. Unfortunately, it can't really tell which button is being pressed. When you try to disarm the system if thinks you want to program the unit, which is a problem as the alarm then goes off, which is especially annoying if you are the first one up and are hoping that your 4 year old will sleep in.In the end I returned the system and went with a Skylink alarm system from Amazon and absolutely love it. The Skylink has real buttons and the setup and programming was incredibly easy. Plus you can arm and disarm it and it works!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: Somebody "Somebody"
Reviews.Content: Very displeased, UNHAPPY, FALSE ADVERTISING ... THIS DID NOT COME WITH THE SIREN/DOORBELL AS ADVERTISED ON AMAZON. I CALLED SECURITY MAN to tell them the SIREN and DOORBELL WAS NOT INCLUDED. THEY WERE NOT HELPFUL AT ALL! RIP OFF!

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use and cost-effective D.I.Y. (Do-It-Yourself) wireless intruder alarm system kit.
Supports up to 60 wireless sensors (15 wireless defense zones and 4 wireless sensors per zone).
Transmit at 430-433MHz frequency band, wireless transmitting distance up to 300 feet (doorbell, remote controller, siren) and up to 450 feet (magnetic smart door/window sensor & PIR motion sensor).
Supports up to 5 phone numbers for auto alarm call and 1 management center protocol(CID).
Supports multiple control panels (pairing each sensor/remote/siren to multiple control panels)
